RuntimeModule.Name: BattleMod
RuntimeModule.Title: BattleMod
RuntimeModule.Description:
This mod makes a few changes related to space combat, and as secondary effect improve how well the AI handle that part of the game.
Bundled with this mod : Flotillas Pathing Rework v.2
The changes :
Main features
-Add extra buffs to ship's experience level (fire rate, damage, shields hp, evasion). -Increase armor HP bonus (2x) and Shields HP (3x). -Fighter and bombers are much faster than stock game. -Fighters are now 3 per squadron, Bombers are now 2. -All white weapons, armor and shields are available in the techtree (removed from curiosities). -Altered ship's target priorities, Support Ships no longer are meat shields for the fleet. -Modified some combat cards to add extra effects or different ranges for flotillas. -Increased every ship's firing arcs angle. -Complete rework of flotillas combat paths (Same as Flotillas Pathing Rework v2). -Fleet formations varies depending on battle cards used (Work in progress). -Many new tooltips to help designs ships properly.
Balance tweaks
-Fleet and siege modules now increase the odds to be targeted by enemy. -Better ships to buy on the Marketplace. -Analyzer modules now increase ship's weapon critical hit chances. -Recycling modules improve the repairs after battle for the ship it's on. -Influence modules now add fleet experience per turn. -Boarding pods are slower, shoot less often (still *I win* weapons when opposition have no troops). -Restrict boarding pods to support ships. -Probes are now available to colony ships. -Changed probe balance. -Increased effects of fleet engines by 1. -Pre-emptive strike (ground combat) now scale with how many troops is available for the assault (will add a tooltip). -Tweaked planets yield so all planets can be worth owning. -Balance pass on system improvements so they all remain useful over the course of the game. -Dust inflation is now based on the average dust production per empire rather than global production. -Marketplace refil their hero offers more often if there are more empires. -Minimum of 3 CP on the center line formation during pre-battle planning.
Mod additions
-Added new white Weapons for each weapon types to be found while exploring anomalies. -Added new class of weapons to discover in anomalies : The Helix Cannons. -Added new class of weapons to discover in anomalies : The Plasma Pulser (formely Plasma Bolts). -Added new white Armors and Shields to be found while exploring anomalies. [Removed]-Added new support modules effects to the game.[Removed] -Added a second siege module (A2S slugs from Aitarus mod).
AI's specifics
-Pirates have better ship designs. -AI has improved design templates. -Altered AI's desire to make hard counters (work in progress). -Cravers ships are weaker, but cost less upkeep, do 10% extra damage and hold more troops. -Horatios ships have more troops, but cost more upkeep (Horatio care too much for the bling). -Vodyanis ships cost less upkeep and hold a bit less troops. -Sophons ships are weaker, but gets 10% bonus to damage. -Root creator hulls cost halved (harmony struggle too much building those). -Leech modules are now only usable on Leech ships and have their cost greatly reduced. -Moderships logistic modules have better yields at low level. -Capped Vodyani and RiftBorn maximum population cost (real issue filling systems otherwise). -Added a progressive cost with a cap to Horatio Cloning. -Increased Harmony rooting speed by 50%.
Note: Compatible with Vaulter and Supremacy DLCs and G2G balance mod (just load Battlemod after it).
Credits: Aitarus, and other modders from the amplitude forums for their ideas.
Special thanks for Aitarus for letting me use some parts of his mod in the earlier stage of creating this one. The A2S slugs technology comes from his mod Combat Rebalance: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1292770225
